attributes.additional_details: Recognise cheerleading as a sport - increasingly, particularly in the United Kingdom Cheerleading teams are competing competitively, it is not just for entertainment.  Young people all over the country are training hard, with dedication and committment to achieve the highest standard possible and compete all over the world. Please help our young people - in order to access funding to help them reach the highest standard and enable them to attend European and international events Cheerleading needs to become a recognised sport.  They are athletes and deserve our support.

rejection.details: Not a Government issue/decision: one for UK Sport to decide upon.
